short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free your browsing space in a snap! Close empty tabs, search result page tabs and launch Zoom tabs with just a single click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Streamline your browsing experience and free up valuable space with our functional extension!

Do you find yourself constantly closing empty tabs or those tabs filled with useless search results and outdated Launch Zoom links? Our Chrome extension has got you covered.

With our one-click solution, you can quickly close any empty tabs cluttering up your browser and say goodbye to those useless search result pages. Our extension supports a wide variety of popular search engines, so you can be sure that you're getting the most out of your browsing experience.

And that's not all - our extension also allows you to close all those old Launch Zoom links taking up unnecessary space on your browser with just one click.

So why wait? Download our extension today and start enjoying the benefits of clutter-free browsing with just one click!!
